CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 27, 1952, pg. 17 reads: "Smiling Happily...are members of the Eckstein family as they anticipate having their famous son and brother, Billy, home for Christmas. Left to right: Mrs. Maxine Whetby, sister of the singer; Mrs. Charlotte Eckstein, mother; William Eckstein, father, and Mrs. Aileen Sawyer, another sister of the popular singer.-Teenie Harris Photo.
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Maxine Eckstein Whetby, Charlotte Eckstein, William Eckstein, and Aileen Eckstein Sawyer, seated on striped sofa, in interior with windows with floral curtains and venetian blinds, another version
